H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H1197.def: = process by which someone or something is harmed or destroyed by fire

H8574.def: = a structure ◄ made of clay or brick, ► in which fuel such as charcoal, wood, or dried grass, is burned, used for baking; ≈ associated with extreme heat, and hence with anger and punishment

H2086.def: = state in which humans have an exalted status in their own eyes, resulting in a failure to see the limits of what is permitted or appropriate in view of one's status, and act accordingly; ≈ often associated with sin, aggression, and rebellion against God

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H7564.def: = action by which humans act in a way that is contrary to (God's) law, ► resulting in a state of guilt

H7179.def: = dry grass-like remnant of wheat or another grain crop following the harvest; this term possibly refers to two kinds of material, one being the remnant of the crop remaining in the ground, the other being the unwanted residue of stalks; ► only used for brick making; ≈ usually considered of little value and needing to be separated from the grain itself; maybe burned

H3857.def: poetic term: = process by which fire gives off flames

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H8328.def: = a part of a plant normally below ground, which acts as a support and collects water and nourishment, ≈ associated with well-being, offspring, and the inclination of the mind

H5800.def: = action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place

H3373.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H8121.def: = celestial body ► that marks day and night and produces warmth and light for the earth

H6666.def: = something that one considers one's rightful due

H2224.def: = process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well-being

H4832.def: = causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident

H3671.def: = part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H6335.def: = action by which animals bring down their foot heavily on the ground or some other object

H5695.def: = male young of a {L:cow<SDBH:פָּרָה>}; ► used as a symbol for a deity; also used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with being willful and untrained

H4770.def: = construction ► where domestic animals are kept permanently with the purpose of fattening them

H6072.def: = action by which animals tread down objects under their feet, ≈ only used in a figurative extension of meaning where humans tread down their enemies as if they were animals

H7563.def: = state in which a person's behavior is inconsistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H665.def: = powdery residue left after the burning of a substance; normally deposited outside of a village or city; ► used by mourners to put on their heads or roll themselves into; ≈ associated with things that are fine and powdery and easily scattered by the wind, with low status, and possibly with mortality as well

H3709.def: = the inner part of the human {L:hand<SDBH:יָד>}, but with special focus on the activities performed with it, such as holding, covering, or lifting objects, leaning on a staff, clapping, etc.

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H8451.def: = causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H2706.def: = specific actions required by somebody in authority

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H2722.def: = a mountain, also known as the mountain of God; ◄ it is located on the {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula, ► and known as the place where God appeared to {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} and where later the law was given to {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} on their way to the promised land

H595.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H3372.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H2764.def: = long net hanging vertically in the water with floats at the upper edge and weights at the lower edge; ► drawn in by men working in boats or from shore; as the ends are drawn together to the boat or drawn ashore, fish are trapped in the area enclosed by the net; drawn in immediately after it has been spread out; ≈ associated with aggression and control
